H0.text: The voltage drop is what voltmeters measure across a resistor.

H1.text: The vibration drop is what voltmeters measure across a resistor.

H2.text: Amplitude is what voltmeters measure across a resistor.

H3.text: Energy loss is what voltmeters measure across a resistor.

A4.text: A voltmeter is an instrument used for measuring electric potential difference between two points in an electric circuit.
